description: Operation Sacred Trust helps to improve very low-income Veteran families' housing stability. The program provides outreach, case management, and will assist participants to obtain VA benefits and other public benefits, such as: health care services, daily living services, personal financial planning services, transportation services, fiduciary and payee services, legal services, child care services, housing counseling services, temporary financial assistance (including time-limited payments to third parties for rent, utilities, moving expenses, security and utility deposits, transportation, child care and emergency supplies).
name: OPERATION SACRED TRUST
